title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Fry the bacon until crispy, then set aside.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated Parmesan cheese.
Drain the spaghetti and quickly mix with the egg mixture.
Add the bacon and season with salt and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt and tikka masala spices for 2 hours.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Prepare the sauce by heating tomato sauce and cream in a pan.
Add the grilled chicken to the sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
